title: section 7 of the Health (Amendment) Act 2021 (No. 1 of 2021)) of the Health
heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Health Act 1947 (Personal
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Health Act 1947 (Personal 

Data) Regulations 2021. 

(2) These Regulations shall come into operation on the 22nd day of March

title: section 7 of the Health (Amendment) Act 2021 (No. 1 of 2021)) of the Health
heading: 4. (1) Special categories of personal data specified in paragraph (2) that are
text_raw:
4. (1) Special categories of personal data specified in paragraph (2) that are 
collected for the purposes of sections 38B and 38J of the Act of 1947 may be 
processed, solely for the purposes and to the extent provided for in that Act, in 
accordance with a contract in force between the data controller and a data 
processor in relation to the processing of such special categories of personal 
data. 

(2) The special categories of personal data referred to in paragraph (1), in 

relation to an applicable traveller, are the following: 

(a) 

(b) 

(c) 

information on dietary requirements for meals while 
quarantine; 

in 

information on accessibility requirements for room allocation 
while in quarantine; 

results of any RT-PCR tests undertaken by applicable travellers 
while undergoing quarantine; 

(d) medical information provided for the purposes of diagnosis or 
treatment of persons who are quarantining in a designated 
facility or for the purposes of requesting a review of quarantine 
under section 38B(16) of the Act of 1947. 

Processing of test results and medical information
text_norm: 4 (1) special category personal data specified paragraph (2) collected purpose section 38b 38j act 1947 may processed solely purpose extent provided act accordance contract force data controller data processor relation processing special category personal data (2) special category personal data referred paragraph (1) relation applicable traveller following (a) (b) (c) information dietary requirement meal quarantine information accessibility requirement room allocation quarantine result rt-pcr test undertaken applicable traveller undergoing quarantine (d) medical information provided purpose diagnosis treatment person quarantining designated facility purpose requesting review quarantine section 38b(16) act 1947 processing test result medical information

title: section 7 of the Health (Amendment) Act 2021 (No. 1 of 2021)) of the Health
heading: 5. Without prejudice to the generality of Regulation 4, personal data
text_raw:
5. Without prejudice to the generality of Regulation 4, personal data 
concerning health, including data relating to the results of a RT-PCR test 
undertaken by a person quarantining in a designated facility, may be processed, 
solely for the purposes and extent provided for in the Act of 1947, in 
accordance with a contract in force between the Minister and a data processor 
in relation to such data. 

Non-disclosure of personal data
text_norm: 5 without prejudice generality regulation 4 personal data concerning health including data relating result rt-pcr test undertaken person quarantining designated facility may processed solely purpose extent provided act 1947 accordance contract force minister data processor relation data non-disclosure personal data

title: section 7 of the Health (Amendment) Act 2021 (No. 1 of 2021)) of the Health
heading: 6. Where personal data or special categories of personal data are provided
text_raw:
6. Where personal data or special categories of personal data are provided 
by an applicable traveller, in accordance with these Regulations or the Act of 
1947, to the data controller or to a data processor referred to in Regulation 3 or 
4, the data controller or the data processor, as the case may be, shall not share 
or otherwise disclose the data – 

 
 
 
 
 4 [126] 

(a) 

(b) 

to another person with whom the Minister has a contract for the 
processing of such data, unless the disclosure is necessary for 
the person to carry out his or her functions under that contract, 
the Act of 1947, and 
these Regulations or 

to a person with whom the Minister does not have a contract for 
the processing of such data, without the explicit consent of the 
applicable traveller. 

Retention of personal data and special categories of personal data
text_norm: 6 personal data special category personal data provided applicable traveller accordance regulation act 1947 data controller data processor referred regulation 3 4 data controller data processor case may shall share otherwise disclose data - 4 126 (a) (b) another person minister contract processing data unless disclosure necessary person carry function contract act 1947 regulation person minister contract processing data without explicit consent applicable traveller retention personal data special category personal data

title: section 7 of the Health (Amendment) Act 2021 (No. 1 of 2021)) of the Health
heading: 7. Personal data and special categories of personal data processed in
text_raw:
7. Personal data and special categories of personal data processed in 
accordance with the provisions of section 38K of the Act of 1947 shall not be 
retained for a period longer than that specified in subsections (3), (4) or (5) of 
that section. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

22 March, 2021. 

STEPHEN DONNELLY, 
Minister for Health. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [126] 5

title: section 7 of the Health (Amendment) Act 2021 (No. 1 of 2021)) of the Health
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

This order sets out the data processing regulations which will apply to 
arrangements relating to the implementation of subsections 38B to 38L 
(inserted by the Health (Amendment) Act 2021) of the Health Act (1947). 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 6 [126]
